overview: A poetic murmur shortens the distance between eighty and twenty-two degrees latitude north, as well as the gap between the Arctic Ocean and the Pearl River Delta. Are the melting glaciers and a small Chinese southern city reclaimed from the sea existing on parallel universes, or is it simply karma? If we get a chance to stay awake, will catastrophe turn out to be nothing but a bad dream?
title: Murmur of Icebergs
